titleStmt.title: The bright morning starre: or, The resolution and exposition of the 22. Psalme preached publikely in foure sermons at Lincolne. By John Smith preacher of the citie.
titleStmt.author: Smyth, John, d. 1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, Printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. And are to be solde at the signe of the Crowns in Pauls Churchyard [in London] by Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
